title: Single Of The Week: Beyonce – 1+1
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/beyonce-3.jpg "beyonce-3")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8228-single-of-the-week-beyonce-11/attachment/beyonce-3)

It’s a rare thing for a piece of music to stop you completely in your tracks; leaving everything and anything meaningless in compression. Shit, it’s even more rare to find such pieces of music on a show like **American Idol**. If such feelings weren’t rare however, then the video bellow might not be so encapsulating. Enjoy the next 7 days of your life. JC
